summary: In Cambodia, Holly, a 12 year old Vietnamese girl, encounters Patrick, an American stolen artifacts dealer. The story follows their strong connection and her unrelenting efforts to escape her fate.
cast: Ron Livingston|Chris Penn|Udo Kier|Virginie Ledoyen|Jacquie Nguyen|Sahajak Boonthanakit|Srey Cham|Kosal Dang|Mudha Dann|Kun Daravann|Sethy Dy|Adi Ezroni|Hugh Kirk|Trungta Kositchimongkol|Lina|Teerawat Mulvilai|Net Ngo|Tor Nhim|David Ohm|Montakan Ransibrahmanakul|Keo Ratha|Kem Sereyvuth|Keo Seriemony|Chit Socheata|Tharinee Songkiatthana|Pen Sopheap|Hun Sophy|Hy Sorim|Chaya Supannarat|Osnat Tamir|Bun Tana|Sorn Tola|Chaiyaporn Torphorn|Chhor Van|Sou Viseth|Kowit Wattanakul
keywords: character name as title|one word title|cambodia|virginity|phnom penh
title: Holly
